items.title: TextCursor
items.description: Make any text element follow your cursor, leaving a trail of copies behind it.

items.name: text-pressure-tw
items.title: TextPressure
items.description: Characters scale / warp interactively based on pointer pressure zone.

items.name: text-type-tw
items.title: TextType
items.description: Typewriter effect with blinking cursor and adjustable typing cadence.

items.name: true-focus-tw
items.title: TrueFocus
items.description: Applies dynamic blur / clarity based over a series of words in order.

items.name: variable-proximity-tw
items.title: VariableProximity
items.description: Letter styling changes continuously with pointer distance mapping.
